skills.name: FIELD MEDICINE
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Grant Lifesteal for 1 turn to self and up to 2 allies.
• Grant Regen for 2 turns to all allies below 50% HP.

skills.name: CORPSE-à-CORPSE
desc: • Deals 99% of your CURRENT HP as true damage to the enemy, and lose the same amount of HP.

skills.name: UNDYING SOLDIER
desc: • Gain Endure for 2 turns at the start of battle..
